mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.sys_contract_no AS "sysContractNo", a.contract_no AS "contractNo", a.subcontract_no AS "subcontractNo", a.settle_object_code AS "settleObjectCode", a.effective_date_fm AS "effectiveDateFm", a.effective_date_to AS "effectiveDateTo", a.contract_type AS "contractType", a.belong_to_company AS "belongToCompany", a.contract_category AS "contractCategory", a.contract_attribution AS "contractAttribution", a.contractor AS "contractor", a.check_accounts_person AS "checkAccountsPerson", a.check_accounts_director AS "checkAccountsDirector", a.check_accounts_time AS "checkAccountsTime", a.billing_requirement AS "billingRequirement", a.invoice_type AS "invoiceType", a.invoice_tax_rate AS "invoiceTaxRate", a.contract_status AS "contractStatus", a.org_id AS "orgId"
LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON a.org_id = so.id LEFT JOIN bms_settle_object bso ON a.settle_object_code = bso.settle_object_code AND a.org_id = bso.org_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bms_contract ( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, rec_ver, sys_contract_no, contract_no, subcontract_no, settle_object_code, effective_date_fm, effective_date_to, contract_type, belong_to_company, contract_category, contract_attribution, contractor, check_accounts_person, check_accounts_director, check_accounts_time, billing_requirement, invoice_type, invoice_tax_rate, contract_status, org_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{recVer}, #{sysContractNo}, #{contractNo}, #{subcontractNo}, #{settleObjectCode}, #{effectiveDateFm}, #{effectiveDateTo}, #{contractType}, #{belongToCompany}, #{contractCategory}, #{contractAttribution}, #{contractor}, #{checkAccountsPerson}, #{checkAccountsDirector}, #{checkAccountsTime}, #{billingRequirement}, #{invoiceType}, #{invoiceTaxRate}, #{contractStatus}, #{orgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bms_contract SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, rec_ver = rec_ver + 1, sys_contract_no = #{sysContractNo}, contract_no = #{contractNo}, subcontract_no = #{subcontractNo}, settle_object_code = #{settleObjectCode}, effective_date_fm = #{effectiveDateFm}, effective_date_to = #{effectiveDateTo}, contract_type = #{contractType}, belong_to_company = #{belongToCompany}, contract_category = #{contractCategory}, contract_attribution = #{contractAttribution}, contractor = #{contractor}, check_accounts_person = #{checkAccountsPerson}, check_accounts_director = #{checkAccountsDirector}, check_accounts_time = #{checkAccountsTime}, billing_requirement = #{billingRequirement}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType}, invoice_tax_rate = #{invoiceTaxRate}, contract_status = #{contractStatus}, org_id = #{orgId} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
UPDATE bms_contract SET contract_status = '90' WHERE contract_status = '10' AND effective_date_to < CURDATE()
